name: Nod-Krai
desc: A part of Snezhnaya which was once home to an ordered and prosperous civilization.

customize.text: Relationships

Snezhnaya
Although Nod-Krai is a part of Snezhnaya and serves

, the area has autonomy.
The first Cryo Archon of Snezhnaya, the Tsar of all fae. He died during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.name: Fae
customize.desc: Followers of the first Cryo Archon, the Winter Tsar, who were created from the bones of giant beasts and fallen frostmoon light.

customize.text:
A race created with forbidden methods, from the bones of giant beasts and fallen frostmoon light. The first angel, who handed the authority to create to the mortals, hoped that one day, these little creatures might create a perfect being that could merge with the world. When the Primordial One found out about the betrayal, they turned the fae into icy silver mist.
The remaining fae began to serve the Belyi Tsar and rule the entire north. Although they are now shorn of their glory, they still influence the nation.

customize.name: Frostmoon Scions
customize.desc: The descendants of the legendary golden realm, who worship the Frostmoon Goddess. They possess powers that are believed to predate the elements.

customize.text:
The descendants of the legendary golden realm, who worship the Frostmoon Goddess. They possess powers that are believed to predate the elements. They often gather on Hiisi Island.
The Wild Hunt
Monsters from the Abyss that attack Nod-Krai. According to the legends, they are a demonic host from another world seeking a harvest of souls. Others believed them to be the lingering phantoms of the Cataclysm.
The first Torchforger
A member of an illustrious family with the Nightingale's emblem, who had traveled to Nod-Krai from the north of Snezhnaya. Originally engaged as spies, the family was elevated to the gentry by the Winter Tsar, and this man of humble origin stepped into the royal palace, mingling among the fae dignitaries of the court. The first Torchforger received power from the maiden of the new moon and cut through the darkness with a beam of light, driving away the Wild Hunt. The Torchforger asked the Tsaritsa for autonomy for the area, promising to contain the Wild Hunt in return.
Lightkeepers
An ancient organisation that has long defended Nod-Krai's freedom and peace against the ceaseless incursions and the Wild Hunt. They built a lighthouse on top of the mountain to keep the monsters away.
Voynich Guild
The merchants of Nasha Town formed a commerce guild to maintain basic order.
Treasure Hoarders
The Treasure Hoarders originated from Nod-Krai.

customize.name: Adventurers' Guild
customize.desc: An organization based in Snezhnaya that recruits adventurers and accepts and distributes commissions. They have a representative office in every major city. Their motto is "Ad astra abyssosque!"

customize.text: The Guild has a strong presence in Nod-Krai.

customize.name: Fatui
customize.desc: A Snezhnayan organization that is loyal to the Tsaritsa and has spread out all over the continent. Its Harbingers are on the hunt for the Gnoses.

customize.text: Special forces who report directly to the Tsaritsa. When the Wild Hunt attacked Nod-Krai, the Warriors of the Pale Star were sent to the area borders, but the order to attack never came. The lead officer went to save innocent citizens, for which he was accused of treason. Recently, the Fatui Harbingers were recalled to Snezhnaya and sent to Nod-Krai. In addition, Nod-Krai has a base led by

customize.name: Il Dottore
customize.desc: The Second of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, codenamed The Doctor. Had multiple "segments" of himself, nearly all of which he destroyed in a deal with the Dendro Archon.

customize.name: Hexenzirkel
customize.desc: A secret witch society, which discusses secrets at the tea parties and explores Irminsul. There are eight witches in the Hexenzirkel.

customize.text: The Hexenzirkel often visits Nod-Krai, where conflicts and various dramas always occur.

customize.name: Knights of Favonius
customize.desc: An order responsible for protecting Mondstadt and its belief of freedom. Despite its members are known as knights, none have been knighted by any royalty â€” knighthood is a title they earned from the noble duties they assume.

customize.text:
The expeditionary company, together with the Grand Master, Varka, set out for Nod-Krai on an important mission.
Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop
A famous machine workshop
Related Items

customize.name: Helka's Notes
customize.desc:
Notes written on pieces of paper printed with conch patterns.
These seem to be drafts made in preparation for composing a monster picture book, and apart from records and descriptions, they also contain some information intended for a companion. Perhaps someone might have switched the copy out for the original by mistake...

customize.text: Trailers and Story Teasers
Behind the Scenes of Genshin Impact "Let's Start With Nod-Krai"

<color=#ffd780>April 30, 2025</color>
"The trinity of moon goddesses have long since faded into the shadows of time, and a new moon is set to rise..."
Follow the Genshin Impact team to learn more about the behind-the-scenes story of Nod-Krai's creation and the new "Song of the Welkin Moon" series.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>
Nod-Krai Preview Teaser - "Prelude to Moonlight"

<color=#ffd780>June 6, 2025</color>
If you want to know more about a certain land, you have to ask the people who live there.
Yet when faced with too many choices, and no way to decide... perhaps you need a witch's keen eye to give you "guidance."
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>
Teyvat Chapter Interlude Teaser: The Gods' Limits

<color=#ffd780>July 9, 2025</color>
In the council of gods, no mortal voice is ever heard.
And thus was the fate of the world arbitrarily determined.
We know that such is the way of the world.
But do the gods act out of contempt...
Or have they at some hour begun to act out of fear?
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>
Nod-Krai Preview Teaser - "Through the Silent Frostbound Night"

<color=#ffd780>July 18, 2025</color>
Born of ages past, the "Frostmoon Scions" hail from a time when the moons still waxed and waned in Teyvat's skies.
But now, the lunar visage stands ever still, much like this silent, frostbound night.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>
Illustrations
Nod-Krai Factions: Fatui

<color=#ffd780>April 25, 2025</color>
The "Palestar Edict," that highest of commands, has gone out. With it, the Fatui Harbingers have been summoned back to Snezhnaya and dispatched to Nod-Krai. The people stare and wonder: for what purpose does this army, bearing the banner of the Pale Star, come to their city? Or perhaps the question should be, "For whom?"
Nod-Krai Factions: Frostmoon Scions

<color=#ffd780>April 26, 2025</color>
The descendants of the legendary golden realm, who chose to find new homes among the mountains and forests after abandoning their ancient civilization. The only thing they never forsook was their faith in the "Moon Goddess." However, with the arrival of the Fatui, it appears that their tranquil lives are about to fade into the realm of yesterday...
Nod-Krai Factions: Lightkeepers

<color=#ffd780>April 27, 2025</color>
The ancient organization that has long defended Nod-Krai's freedom and peace against the ceaseless incursions and Wild Hunt attacks launched by the Abyss, now severely weakened from battles past. In the face of new threats, none can say for sure if the new generation of Ratniki will remain able to carry out their mission...
Nod-Krai Factions: The Wild Hunt

<color=#ffd780>April 28, 2025</color>
The armies of the Abyss sweep across the wilderness and canyons like a storm, and if you venture close enough, you may even hear their eerie whispers. These lost, soulless monsters appear to be silently searching for something...
Nod-Krai Factions: Voynich Guild

<color=#ffd780>April 29, 2025</color>
The merchants of Nasha Town formed a commerce guild to maintain basic order. However, how could the outlaws that prowl between the islands be controlled by something as simple as mere rules? It seems that the honor of striking fear into their hearts must go to the boss lady of the "Curatorium of Secrets"...
